name: Create Notification
description: Create a user-facing notification and persist it to the notifications store (global or space-scoped).

user_id.description: Target user identifier the notification belongs to.

scope.description: Where to persist the notification (global or space). Defaults to space scoped if a space_id is provided, otherwise global.

space_id.description: Optional space to scope the notification. Required when scope=space for a different space than the current context.

title.description: Short title or subject line for the notification.

message.description: Longer body content that explains the notification.

severity.description: Visual severity hint for the UI (info, success, warning, error).

source.description: Optional identifier describing who or what generated the notification.

metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata payload for the UI/agents to leverage.

actions.description: Optional list of follow-up actions (links, tool calls, etc.).

expires_at.description: ISO timestamp after which the notification can be ignored/hidden.
